text: José Ricardo da Silva, also known as China (born 11 September 1939, in Fortaleza) is a retired Brazilian professional footballer who played as a forward. da Silva played for six seasons (101 games, 37 goals) in the Italian Serie A for U.C. Sampdoria, A.S. Roma, L.R. Vicenza and A.C. Mantova. ==Honours== * Campeonato Carioca champion: 1961, 1962 * Torneio Rio-São Paulo winner: 1962 * Represented Brazil at the 1960 Summer Olympics ==External links== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Italy Category:Serie A players Category:U.C. title: China (footballer, born 1939)
